lab.title: Hands-On Lab: Superstep in Big Data And Databases

sections.title: Exploring Superstep

exercises.description: Implement a basic example demonstrating Superstep
exercises.starter_code:
# TODO: Implement Superstep
# Your code here

sections.background: Within each "superstep", each processing units first receive all messages delivered to them from the preceding "superstep", and then manipulate their local data and may queue up the message that it intends to send to other processing units.

metadata.concept_definition: Within each "superstep", each processing units first receive all messages delivered to them from the preceding "superstep", and then manipulate their local data and may queue up the message that it intends to send to other processing units.
